solution_line_template: First find how many total seats are in the 80-seat subsections: {seats_per_subsection_80} seats/subsection * {num_subsections_80} subsections = {total_seats_80_subsections} seats

Then add the number of seats in the 60-seat section to find the total number of seats in Section A: {total_seats_80_subsections} seats + {seats_60_subsection} seats = <<{total_seats_80_subsections}+{seats_60_subsection}={total_seats_section_A}>>{total_seats_section_A} seats
Then triple that number: {total_seats_section_A} seats * {triple_multiplier} = <<{total_seats_section_A}*{triple_multiplier}={triple_section_A_seats}>>{triple_section_A_seats} seats

Then add {extra_seats_section_B} seats to find the total number of seats in Section B: {triple_section_A_seats} seats + {extra_seats_section_B} seats = <<{triple_section_A_seats}+{extra_seats_section_B}={total_seats_section_B}>>{total_seats_section_B} seats
